faq.question: How long does it take to build a website?
faq.answer: The timeline depends on the complexity of your project. A basic website typically takes 2-3 weeks, while more complex sites with custom features can take 4-8 weeks. We'll provide you with a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

faq.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
faq.answer: Yes! All our packages include free support for the first month. After that, we offer various maintenance packages to keep your website updated, secure, and performing optimally. We're always here to help with any questions or updates you need.

faq.question: Will my website work on mobile devices?
faq.answer: Absolutely! All websites we create are fully responsive, meaning they automatically adapt to work perfectly on smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers. Mobile-friendly design is standard in all our packages.

faq.question: Can I update the website content myself?
faq.answer: Yes, we build most websites with user-friendly content management systems that allow you to easily update text, images, and other content. We also provide training on how to use these tools effectively.

faq.question: What if I need changes after the website is complete?
faq.answer: We include minor revisions in our packages, and we're always available for additional updates. We offer flexible maintenance packages and can discuss ongoing support options based on your specific needs.

faq.question: Do you help with domain and hosting?
faq.answer: Yes, we can help you choose and register a domain name, and we can recommend reliable hosting providers. We can also handle the technical setup to ensure your website launches smoothly.

faq.question: What makes Azzelera different from other web design companies?
faq.answer: We specialize in working with small businesses and understand your unique challenges and budget constraints. We focus on creating websites that not only look great but also help you achieve your business goals. Our personalized approach ensures you get exactly what you need.

faq.question: Can you help improve my existing website?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer website redesign and improvement services. We can update your design, improve functionality, enhance SEO, or add new features to your existing site. Contact us to discuss your specific needs.
